doc.after: Overpowering Urquiza in the 1861 Battle of Pav n Bartolom Mitre secured Buenos Aires predominance and was elected as the first president of the reunified country He was followed by Domingo Faustino Sarmiento and Nicol s Avellaneda these three presidencies set up the bases of the modern Argentine State 51
